question.text:
X+K2CO3+Air→heatY
Y+Cl2→ZPink
Which of the following is correct?

options.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">w</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow></msub></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></math>

solution.text: Here X=black,MnO2,Y=green,K2MnO4,Z=KMnO4
